Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:凡

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+51E1

Main pronunciation 主要发音: fán

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning something that caches the wind and is big. Meaning all, or any.

English senses 英语理解: all, any, every; ordinary, common

Usage example 用法举例: 凡人 fán rén ( ordinary person)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 866

Shuowen 说文解字: 最括也從二二偶也從ㄋㄋ古文及

凢字的基本解释

凢
fán
同“凡”。

凢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fán］
［《廣韻》符咸切，平凡，奉。］
亦作“凢1”。
(1)所有；凡是。
(2)总计；总共。
(3)皆，都。
(4)只是；不过是。
(5)大旨；大略。
(6)平常；普通。
(7)尘世。
(8)工尺谱中记音符号之一。
(9)古国名。姬姓，始封之君为周公之子。在今河南辉县西南。

凢字的康熙字典解释

fán

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fán］
["Guangyun" Fu Xianqie, ordinary, bong. ]
Also known as "Fan 1".
(1) All; everything.
(2) Total; total.
(3) All, all.
(4) Just; but it is.
(5) Purpose; rough outline.
(6) Ordinary; ordinary.
(7) Earthly.
(8) One of the notation marks in Gongchi score.
(9) Ancient country name. The surname Ji is the son of Lord Zhou. In today's southwest of Hui County, Henan Province.
